title: Bug 6304: Cannot sync a .java file and another resource
OB: When selecting a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer, the context menu does not have the 'Team' entry.
EB: The context menu should have the 'Team' entry when selecting a .java file and another resource in the package viewer.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
